an7.64:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṁ āgacchanti itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:1.6: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya nandati.
an7.64:1.7: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, kiñcāpi so hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano;
an7.64:1.8: atha kho so dubbaṇṇova hoti kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:1.9: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:2.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sukhaseyyāya nandati.
an7.64:2.5: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, kiñcāpi so pallaṅke seti gonakatthate paṭalikatthate kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇe sauttaracchade ubhatolohitakūpadhāne;
an7.64:2.6: atha kho so dukkhaññeva seti kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:2.7: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:3.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa pacuratthatāya nandati.
an7.64:3.5: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, anatthampi gahetvā ‘attho me gahito’ti maññati, atthampi gahetvā ‘anattho me gahito’ti maññati.
an7.64:3.6: Tassime dhammā aññamaññaṁ vipaccanīkā gahitā dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti kodhābhibhūtassa.
an7.64:3.7: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:4.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa bhogavatāya nandati.
an7.64:4.5: Kodhanassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa kodhābhibhūtassa kodhaparetassa, yepissa te honti bhogā uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatā bāhābalaparicitā sedāvakkhittā dhammikā dhammaladdhā, tepi rājāno rājakosaṁ pavesenti kodhābhibhūtassa.
an7.64:4.6: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:5.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa yasavatāya nandati.
an7.64:5.5: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, yopissa so hoti yaso appamādādhigato, tamhāpi dhaṁsati kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:5.6: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:6.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:6.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa mittavatāya nandati.
an7.64:6.5: Kodhanaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalaṁ kodhābhibhūtaṁ kodhaparetaṁ, yepissa te honti mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā, tepi ārakā parivajjanti kodhābhibhūtaṁ.
an7.64:6.6: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, chaṭṭho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati:
an7.64:7.2: ‘aho vatāyaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyyā’ti.
an7.64:7.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati.
an7.64:7.5: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
an7.64:7.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:7.8: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sattamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
an7.64:8.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṁ āgacchanti itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vāti.
